intro: Gesneria scabra subsp. sphaerocarpa, commonly known as the rough gesneria, is a compact, evergreen shrub native to the tropical regions of South America. It features glossy, dark green leaves that are covered in fine, short hairs, giving them a rough texture. The plant produces clusters of small, fragrant white flowers during the summer months. It thrives in bright, indirect light and well-draining soil, making it suitable for indoor cultivation. Its unique foliage and compact growth habit make it a popular choice for collectors and enthusiasts of tropical plants.
